TopicTitle: Where do you find the KSP directory on your hard drive?

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I wanted to install a download file (craft file) but I can't find the KSP directory!

I download the game from Steam - any ideas please?

Keith

3 hours ago, Silverwood said:

Hi,

I wanted to install a download file (craft file) but I can't find the KSP directory!

I download the game from Steam - any ideas please?

Keith

If you right click the game in your Steam library and select properties a new window will open up, select the "Local Files" tab and then find the button that says "Browse Local Files" this will take you directly to your KSP install folder.

Or; you could just manually navigate to: This PC>OS(:C)>ProgramFiles (x86)>Steam>steamapps>common>Kerbal Space Program.

Edited July 11, 2017 by Rocket In My Pocket

Assuming you're on Linux, it's at:

$HOME/.local/share/Steam/SteamApps/common/Kerbal Space Program

Ok thanks. I am on PC (W7) and have found the files now.

As always thanks you all.

Keith
